message: Let's start with a generous offer, Bob! Accept and we can end the game early.
You're starting strong, but I'm not getting taken to the cleaners that easily. Let's meet in the middle!
Meet me in the middle, but with a slight bias towards me, of course!
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not falling for it. I'll meet you in the middle, but I'm not giving you the upper hand.
Time to get serious, Bob. Let's split it 50/50 and end this game.
